Name: A Slime In Time
About the game: Dive into a world where a simple slime must help a 100-year-old sentient blender, Sir Blendsworth, retrieve chocolate-covered ice cream for his 100th birthday! Jump from platform to platform, moving through time to find a clear path, but beware. The higher you climb, the farther you fall. This adventure will require a strong will and a mastery of the art of jumping. Never forget, every time you fall only brings you closer to beating the jump, and in turn, the legendary ice cream! Gameplay - Punishing Platforming! Jump towards the sky, increase your skill but beware of the risk of falling. the higher you climb, the further you fall! - Hold to charge your jump and release to climb! This simple mechanic requires time and skill to master. - Patience is a virtue! Don't let the rage build up, remember to take a step back. Sometimes the obvious path is not the easiest path.
